tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NetworkingContacts (
	contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	contact_name VARCHAR(50),
	contact_email VARCHAR(50),
	contact_phone VARCHAR(13),
	last_contact_date DATE,
	follow_up_required BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE networking_contacts (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contact_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_contact_date DATE,
  follow_up_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE follow_up_history (
  follow_up_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_id INT,
  follow_up_date DATE,
  follow_up_description TEXT,
  follow_up_result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES networking_contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contacts (
    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    company VARCHAR(100),
    last_contacted_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE follow_ups (
    follow_up_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id INT NOT NULL,
    follow_up_date DATE,
    follow_up_type VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (interaction_id) REFERENCES interactions(interaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_contacts (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  last_contact_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE follow_ups (
  follow_up_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_id INT,
  follow_up_date DATE,
  topic VARCHAR(255),
  outcome VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES network_contacts(contact_id)
)

CREATE TABLE communication_methods (
  method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  method_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE contact_notes (
  note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_id INT,
  note_text TEXT,
  note_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES network_contacts(contact_id)
)

CREATE TABLE contacts (
    contact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR,
    company VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_id UUID,
    interaction_date DATE,
    communication_channel VARCHAR,
    outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR,
    event_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR,
    description TEXT
);
